name: opensearch-setup
description: Custom resource that creates index in OpenSearch.

scripts.build:zip: zip -rq --exclude=*tests* --exclude=package-lock.json opensearch-setup.zip node_modules/ && zip -urj opensearch-setup.zip src/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps --omit=dev && npm run build:zip && npm run build:dist
